programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman descobre uma criatura em extino durante um acampamento. No incio, todos acham legal, mas em seguida, todos se do conta que na verdade esta criatura, na verdade, um animal pr-histrico extremamente chato.

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Projeto Pandora, (2000, Action)

programme.title: Risco Absoluto, (2010, Drama)

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: A romancista Catherine est novamente em apuros com a lei e a Scotland Yard nomeia o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass para avali-la. No entanto, como o detetive Nick Curran antes dele, Glass fica fascinado por Tramell e atrado para um jogo sedutor.

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657, (2015, Action)

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez

programme.title: Heist, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

programme.title: S.W.A.T., (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Two veterans team up with a pair of rookies to form the most freewheeling S.W.A.T. team ever. Their first assignment: transport an international drug kingpin into federal custody - after he's offered $100 million to anyone who will free him!

programme.title: S.W.A.T.: Firefight, (2011, Action)

programme.desc: A SWAT compound comes under fire from an international terrorist, who relentlessly and violently pursues a mystery man who was apprehended by Seattle SWAT after a raid went horribly wrong.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York, (2003, Drama)
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's epic film set in mid-19th century Lower Manhattan tells the story of a young Irish immigrant (Leonardo DiCaprio) seeking revenge against the rival gang leader who killed his father.

programme.title: Thunderheart, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: Gangs Of New York, (2003, Drama)
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's epic film set in mid-19th century Lower Manhattan tells the story of a young Irish immigrant (Leonardo DiCaprio) seeking revenge against the rival gang leader who killed his father.

programme.title: Go, (1999, Screwball)
programme.desc: Ronna needs to make some extra cash. Simon wants to escape to Vegas for the weekend. Adam and Zack want to stay out of trouble. But it's not just another night in the life of these unusual characters.

programme.title: The 4:30 Movie, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Kevin Smith's most personal film to date, a teenage cinephile tries to woo the girl of his dreams while dealing with a hilarious mix of friends and enemies at his local cinema.

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Drugstore June, (2024, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: Chef, (2014, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A troubled chef looks to reignite his passion for cooking by launching a food truck in this spicy film.

programme.title: Eat Drink Man Woman, (1994, Foreign Comedies)
programme.desc: A delicious comedy about food, fatherhood and family ties. Widower Tao Chu, Taiwan's most famous chef, struggles with accepting his three daughters' appetite for boys, an interest that begins to break the family apart with hilarious and touching results.

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: A Chinese Yuppie living in New York who decides that a marriage of convenience is the perfect way to prevent his parents back in Taiwan from discovering he is gay. But his plan backfires when his parents insist on coming to New York for the wedding.

programme.title: The People vs. Larry Flynt, (1996, Drama)

programme.desc: A heartwarming story of three outcasts coping with the frustrations of life in New York City. Starring Jack Nicholson as a curmudgeon and Greg Kinnear as a gay artist who live in the same building with Helen Hunt, the waitress who changes their lives.

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape, (1993, Drama)

programme.title: Sense and Sensibility, (1995, Drama)

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Drama)

programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer? Can Joey master the uncanny abilities of his new card to pound Mai's Harpie Ladies before they slash him to shreds?

programme.desc: Professor Hawkins has discovered startling connections between the world's conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and an ancient lost civilization.

programme.desc: A cross-country expedition turns tragic when Dartz's new duelists separate Yugi from Joey in order to capture their souls separately.

programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.desc: Rafael calls forth Guardian Dreadscythe, a ravaging reaper that can never be defeated.

programme.desc: After discovering the location of Dartz's secret base, our heroes are on their way to stop Dartz once and for all. Can they reach Dartz before he resurrects the lethal Grand Dragon Leviathan from its millennial slumber?

programme.desc: Dartz's secrets are finally revealed! As the answers to the most puzzling questions are exposed, the Pharaoh and Kaiba realize how much is at stake.

programme.title: A dragon regains his boyish form, a noble warrior once feared dead makes a shocking resurrection, and bitter enemies set aside their differences to enjoy a well-deserved feast!

programme.sub-title: A Touching Reunion! Momonosuke and Kin'emon!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It's Time to Say Goodbye! Leaving Punk Hazard!

programme.title: On their way after having set out from Punk Hazard, the Straw Hats find out their next destination - just as a huge wave comes crashing down on the Sunny! But it's rough sailing for the G-5 as well, as Donflamingo arrives on the scene and wreaks havoc!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The G-5 Wiped Out! Doflamingo's Sudden Attack!

programme.title: Aokiji's intercession saves Smoker and sends Joker off to rethink his strategy, leaving unanswered questions about Aokiji's current status. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats catch their breath as the Sunny makes its way through the rough seas of the New World.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Smooth seas stretch out before the Straw Hats as they leave Punk Hazard far behind -- but while they fear Donflamingo's return and prepare to face him, another foe lies in wait, whose powers could be their downfall!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Caesar Goes Missing! The Pirate Alliance Makes a Sortie!

programme.title: Breed has Luffy, Trafalgar, and Chopper firmly in his grasp with his Peto-Peto power! Breed dreams of a world in which he has enslaved all the humans, but Luffy's stubborn persistence and unwillingness to cooperate may have landed him in hot water.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Dies at Sea?! The Pirate Alliance Comes Apart!

programme.title: Dressrosa! Luffy and the Straw Hats divide into teams and set about their business on this passionate, enchanting island! But here, in the heart of enemy territory, danger lurks around every corner. Luffy and the others encounter a mysterious blind man.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explore! A Kingdom of Love and Passion - Dressrosa!

programme.title: Out and about in Dressrosa, Luffy and his team encounter a mysterious and powerful blind gambler - and run into trouble while his shocking powers distract everyone! Meanwhile, a major event in the Colosseum draws huge crowds.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Full of Enthusiasm! The Corrida Colosseum!

programme.title: Zoro, Sanji, and Kin'emon strike off in search of the thieving fairy who has taken Zoro's sword, but Sanji finds himself mesmerized by the beautiful dancing of a gorgeous Dressrosa woman - with a deadly secret!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Dangerous Love! The Dancer Girl - Violet!

programme.title: Luffy enters the Corrida Colosseum in order to compete for Ace's Flare-Flare Fruit! But with the mightiest warriors of the New World assembled and standing in his way, the competition will not be easy. The first stage of the competition is a battle royal.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Formidable, Unknown Warrior! Here Comes Lucy!

programme.title: While the deadly battle of Block A winds down, all the onlookers in the stadium are shocked to discover the secret identity of the winner! Meanwhile, Luffy's cover may be blown as another voice from the past returns.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy meets an unexpected acquaintance from the past, Bellamy, who seems to be up to no good! Meanwhile, Caesar Handover Team encounters a snag when they learn just how dangerous Green Bit is!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fateful Reunion! Bellamy the Hyena!

programme.title: The battle heats up and the widely despised Bartolomeo takes the ring! But he'll have to contend with both the Prodence Kingdom contingent, and Dressrosa's own local favorite, Bellamy! From up above, Luffy risks having his cover blown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Super Rookie! Bartolomeo the Cannibal!

programme.title: Don Chinjao continues to provoke Luffy, hoping to gain revenge against the grandson of his sworn enemy, Garp! But as the argument continues, Luffy risks having his cover blown, and his identity revealed! Meanwhile, the battle in Block B rages.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big Names Duke It Out! The Heated Block B Battle!

programme.title: The battle for Block B hits a crescendo as King Elizabello II prepares his devastating King Punch! But as the powerful attack becomes imminent, the Prodence Kingdom faction unravels! All that may be pointless, though.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Blow! The Astonishing King Punch!

programme.title: As the handover team approaches Green Bit, they are attacked by the fearsome fish that live off the coast of Dressrosa. But that's the least of their problems as they find the bridge to Green Bit has collapsed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fighting Fish Strike! Across the Deadly Iron Bridge!

programme.title: Zoro tracks the thief who stole his sword - and learns about a danger facing the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Law, Usopp, and the others arrive at Green Bit only to find it inhabited by strange creatures, and swarming with the Navy soldiers!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: All but done for, Sanji is trapped by Violet and her crew when she suddenly changes her mind and mysteriously turns on her own men! Meanwhile, Robin and Usopp come face to face with the Little People known as the Tontatta Tribe.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unknown World! The Tontatta Kingdom!

programme.title: Sanji gets in touch with Law in order to share a shocking secret - that could unsettle the Straw Hats' plans in Dressrosa for good! Meanwhile, Luffy's Block C battle begins, but will his Gum-Gum powers give him away?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Stratagem of the Century! Doflamingo Makes His Move!

programme.title: Sanji and Franky try to regroup after Doflamingo's betrayal, hoping that destroying the factory is not yet out of their grasp. Meanwhile Luffy makes a friend in the Colosseum and Usopp ends up thrust into an uncomfortable position!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shaking Heaven and Earth! Admiral Fujitora's Power!

programme.title: The Sunny is mysteriously deformed by the bizarre powers of Giolla! Can Nami, Chopper, and Brook act in time to save their beloved home? Meanwhile, the battle for Block C continues as Luffy suffers a staggering setback.

programme.sub-title: A Blow of Anger! A Giant vs. Lucy!

programme.sub-title: Light and Shadow! Darkness behind Dressrosa!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Making a Sortie! The Legendary Hero Usoland!

programme.title: Don Chin Jao's hatred of Garp and Luffy is finally explained, while his battle against Luffy comes to an end. With tremendous power, one of them is squarely eliminated! But is that really the end of the Colosseum battle?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fierce Battle Coming to the End! Lucy vs. Chin Jao!

programme.title: With the battle with Don Chinjao long behind him, Luffy advances to the final round! Block-D contender Cavendish, however, takes the chance and pounces on Luffy, who is defended by an unlikely ally! The agenda of Colosseum gladiator Rebecca is exposed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy and the Gladiator of Fate - Rebecca!

programme.title: Rebecca's deep bonds with the one-legged toy soldier are revealed! Her lineage can be traced to the previous ruler of Dressrosa - and her eternal bond with the damaged toy is linked to the violent overthrow of that regime by none other than Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect You to the End! Rebecca and the Toy Soldier!

programme.title: As Rebecca enters the ring for the battle for Block D, the crowd shows its contempt for her heritage - only to be scolded by an unlikely supporter. Meanwhile, the other Straw Hats start to reassemble to deal with the attack on the Sunny.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Last - and Bloodiest - Block! Block D Battle Begins!

programme.title: Doflamingo recounts for Law the surprising history of the Don Quixote Family, while Nami and the others battle the insane and powerful artist, Giolla! Her ultimate attack renders them incapacitated, and prompts the betrayal of one of their closest allies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle! Giolla vs. the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Law is pinned by Fujitora, and Doflamingo has the upper hand! Only the most cunning of tricks could save Law's plan to hand Caesar over to Nami & the others! Meanwhile, the Sunny falls into danger again, & the battle for Block D heats up in the Colosseum.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Beautiful Sword! Cavendish of the White Horse!

programme.title: Law must put himself in harm's way to defend the Sunny and the Straw Hats from Doflamingo's all-out assault! With barely enough time to save the crew, plans change and send the Sunny on a new mission -- but will it be able to get underway?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Clash! Sanji vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Law & Doflamingo are embroiled in a heated showdown which triggers Momonosuke's memories of Doflamingo's cruelty from the first time they met; meanwhile, after a tearful fanboy conversation Zoro finally gets to see Luffy but all eyes are fixed on Rebecca.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rebecca's Special Attack! Last-Ditch Sword Dance!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Good-Bye Partner"
programme.desc: When Zenigata is arrested for suspicion of being part of the Lupin gang, Lupin is talked into stealing Time Crystal to prove Pops' innocence.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Blood Seal of the Eternal Mermaid"
programme.desc: The Mermaid's Scale is a mysterious aquamarine gemstone that Lupin has been hired to steal it... but it turns out to be a forgery. Now, he needs to find the real jewel before it can be used to destroy the whole world!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Prison Of The Past"
programme.desc: When the Lupin gang hears the news that Finnegan Corbett, fondly referred to the 'Modern Day Robin Hood', is finally set to be executed, they travel to Kingdom of Dorrente to break him loose

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Green vs. Red"
programme.desc: If Lupin is stealing something in one place, how can he be shoplifting in another place? One Lupin wears red; the other wears green. In the final standoff, whose side will Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko choose?

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Italian Game"
programme.desc: The stage is set in Italy. Rebecca has been kidnapped! She belongs to one of the most prominent families in the Republic of San Marino and the young woman is the CEO of the Rossellini conglomerate which operates the largest chain of hotels in Italy.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin learns that a treasure trove lies in a volcano on Cleo Island, but it can only be reached when the mountain isn't spewing molten lava! He tries to convince Jigen and Goemon to join him but they're not interested.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko informs Lupin that fine quality diamonds from South Africa are stored in a safe of a global syndicate and importer of diamonds. Lupin makes his way as a worker in the boiler room, and steals the loot of diamonds.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds out about the jewel "Poison Trio" of the Borges family and decides to steal it after Fujiko goads him. Galdan, the nephew of Lucricia greets Lupin, and tells him that elderly Lucricia had been arrested and must be broken out of jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes on a safe-cracking rampage and rakes in 10 million francs. He needs the money to purchase the world's only rare Gold Butterfly at an auction. But Lupin drops the 10 million francs while on the run

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin scopes a jewelry museum where the billion-dollar gem Cleopatra's Tear is displayed. But Lupin can't get to it because the display case is secured by high-voltage electricity.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: No thief has ever succeeded in stealing the secret gem of Pompeii's nunnery; it's guarded by venomous snakes. Even Arsene Lupin gave up on it, since he hates snakes. But Lupin takes on the challenge. Will Lupin succeed? And what kind of secret gem is it?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Hes a composite of some 200 personalities, each and every one a notorious killer. Hes Sid 6.7, a virtual reality creation designed to put L.A. police officers to the test.

programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.desc: What if a child from another world crash-landed on Earth, but instead of becoming a hero to mankind, he proved to be something far more sinister?

programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.desc: The cattle rancher McLintock (John Wayne) puts his brand on the territory and every woman in it! Louise Warren plays a widow who moves with her two children onto McLintocks ranch to serve as cook, while Maureen OHara plays the estranged wife.

programme.title: Valdez Is Coming, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: In this rousing Western, when a greedy rancher causes the death of an innocent man, former sheriff Bob Valdez (Burt Lancaster) orders him to provide financial support for the widow. But when he refuses, Valdez vows to exact justice at any cost!

programme.title: Wagon Team, (1952, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry jails himself to work on the suspected thief of an Army payroll, who escapes, but Gene catches up with him at the medicine show. It's a showdown when Gene goes after the missing payroll.

programme.desc: Em um futuro onde as pessoas param de envelhecer aos 25 anos, o dinheiro pode comprar juventude imortal. Will Salas acusado de assassinato e foge com um refm que talvez possa quebrar o sistema.

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingana Explosiva
programme.desc: Ruslan Drachev um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experincias. Ao visitar sua famlia ele descobre que sua filha est casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Blitz um serial killer de Londres que est matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polcia duro, inflexvel e politicamente incorreto, tero a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata.

programme.title: Os Reis da Rua
programme.desc: Um policial veterano vai contra cultura policial da qual fez parte a sua carreira inteira.

programme.title: O Grito 3
programme.desc: Dr. Sullivan descobre que os fantasmas de Kayako e Toshio tm como alvo uma nova famlia. Se ela falhar em convencer uma misteriosa mulher japonesa a ajudar a banir os espritos vingativos, todos os envolvidos enfrentaro um destino pior do que a morte.

programme.title: Dia dos Namorados Macabro
programme.desc: H 20 anos, um trgico acidente no Dia dos Namorados matou cinco mineiros quando supervisores abandonaram seus postos para ir a um baile. No aniversrio da tragdia, o nico sobrevivente volta cidade em busca de uma vingana sangrenta.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: O Principal Suspeito
programme.desc: Sem dinheiro, o estudante Martin vira vigia noturno no necrotrio da cidade, mas o tranquilo trabalho se torna aterrorizante quando um assassino em srie passa a deixar pistas que apontam para ele.

programme.title: Psicopata Americano
programme.desc: Patrick Bateman um yuppie de Wall Street, obcecado com sucesso, status, estilo, com uma noiva deslumbrante. Ele tambm um assassino psictico que estupra, mata e desmembra estranhos e conhecidos sem provocao ou propsito.

programme.title: Espelhos do Medo
programme.desc: O mal usa espelhos para entrar na casa de um segurana com problemas.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: O Despertar
programme.desc: Selene, que descobre que tem um filha adolescente chamada Lycan, uma hbrida de vampiro e humano. Juntas, elas devem impedir a empresa biotecnolgica Antigen de produzir as criaturas conhecidas como SuperLycans.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: Matador de Aluguel
programme.desc: Joe um detetive, mas tambm um assassino por encomenda. Quando Chris, um traficante, tem seu estoque roubado pela prpria me, ele resolve contratar os servios de 'Killer Joe' para se livrar da morte usando o dinheiro do seguro de vida de sua me.

programme.title: Clube da Luta
programme.desc: Um homem deprimido conhece um fabricante de sabonetes, e juntos formam um clube de luta clandestino que evolui para algo inesperado.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubaro de 6 Cabeas
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivncia quando um tubaro de 6 cabeas comea a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: O Preo do Amanh

programme.title: Tempestade de Meteoros
programme.desc: Para a astrnoma Michelle Young, um evento celestial nico se transforma em um pesadelo quando milhares de meteoros rompem a superfcie da atmosfera e bombardeiam a cidade de San Francisco.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: A Evoluo

programme.title: Megaterremoto
programme.desc: Enquanto um terremoto de enorme proporo ameaa atingir a cidade de So Francisco, uma equipe de especialistas em desastres naturais trabalha para salvar o maior nmero de vidas possvel antes que a cidade seja completamente destruda.

programme.title: O Alvo Final
programme.desc: Depois de matar o dono de um bar em uma briga, Bobby Kalinowsky, um ex-membro do SEAL, deve procurar sua filha sequestrada.

programme.title: Sem Perdo
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: O Guardio
programme.desc: Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo Mxico para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresrio. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgat-la e proteg-la.

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657
programme.desc: Um pai no tem meios para pagar o tratamento mdico da filha. Como ltimo recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas do errado, eles so forados a sequestrar um nibus da cidade.

programme.title: Assassino Americano
programme.desc: O gngster americano Erik Vasquez est planejando se tornar o principal chefe do submundo mexicano, apenas para se ver fazendo inimigos tanto dos poderosos cartis quanto de seus prprios aliados.

programme.title: Sem Perdo
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: Ninja
programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.title: O Justiceiro
programme.desc: Um policial problemtico disfarado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacvel. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se v lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua famlia.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliao

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan (1998)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Defiance (2008)
programme.desc: In 1941 three refugee brothers (Daniel Craig, Liev Schreiber, Jamie Bell) turn a daily struggle to survive into a personal battle to save their people from the Nazis.

programme.title: The Cut (2024)
programme.desc: Given one last shot at glory, a former boxing champion has just six days to make weight for a title fight. His obsession soon leaves him at the mercy of a notorious trainer who takes every last ounce from his mind, body and soul.

programme.title: Raging Bull (1980)
programme.desc: The violent nature of prizefighter Jake LaMotta (Robert De Niro) leads first to a boxing championship, then to a downward spiral of self-destruction.

programme.title: Safe (2012)
programme.desc: A young girl whose memory holds a priceless numerical code, finds herself pursued. Coming to her aid is an ex-cage fighter whose life was destroyed by the gangsters on Meis trail.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October (1990)
programme.desc: Moscow, Washington and a CIA analyst (Alec Baldwin) track a renegade Soviet captain (Sean Connery) and his new submarine.

programme.title: Dreamland (2019)
programme.desc: A teen bounty hunter is torn between helping or capturing a seductive fugitive bank robber hiding in his small town during the Great Depression.

programme.title: Alone in Berlin (2016)
programme.desc: A German couple lose their son in WWII, prompting them to become secretly anti-Nazi.

programme.title: Dark Asset (2023)
programme.desc: While attempting to pick up a woman at a bar, a mysterious man weaves a tale involving spies, implanted microchips, and the dangerous military scientist pursuing him. Little does she know, this stranger is actually telling her the truth.

programme.title: Singularity (2017)
programme.desc: In 2020, a supercomputer deems mankind a threat and launches an all-out attack. Nearly a century later, two teenagers struggle to survive in the rubble of a ruined world, hoping to reach a sanctuary where humans live without fear of robots.

programme.title: First Blood (1982)
programme.desc: Green Beret veteran Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) takes on a Pacific Northwest sheriff (Brian Dennehy) and the National Guard.

programme.title: Rambo III (1988)
programme.desc: Former Special Forces agent John Rambo blasts through Soviet-occupied Afghanistan in search of his captive mentor.

programme.title: Noah (2014)
programme.desc: God chooses Noah (Russell Crowe) to build an ark and save the animals and his family from an apocalyptic flood.

programme.title: American Renegades (2017)
programme.desc: On assignment in war-torn Europe, Navy SEALs discover gold at the bottom of a lake -- a fortune rumored to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. When the enemy detects the team, the SEALs are left with only 10 hours to recover the treasure.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate (2019)
programme.desc: Seasoned warrior Sarah Connor joins forces with a hybrid cyborg human and the T-800 model to protect a young woman from the Rev-9 -- a newly modified and seemingly indestructible liquid Terminator from the future.

programme.title: Disturbia (2007)
programme.desc: Under house arrest, a troubled youth (Shia LaBeouf) is unsure if his neighbor (David Morse) is really a serial killer or if his suspicions are the result of a captive and overactive imagination.

programme.title: Gone Baby Gone (2007)
programme.desc: Two private investigators (Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan) tread dangerous ground as they scour the Boston underworld for a kidnapped child.

programme.title: The Equalizer (2014)
programme.desc: A man who believes he has put his mysterious past behind him cannot stand idly by when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters.

programme.title: Sex Therapy (2009)
programme.desc: A man (Josh Cooke) finds his life becoming unexpectedly complicated when he joins a recovery group for sex addicts in a bid to win the gal of his dreams.

programme.title: The Ledge (2011)
programme.desc: After an atheistic neighbor (Charlie Hunnam) has an affair with his wife, a vengeful Fundamentalist forces the man to choose between killing himself or allowing someone else to die in his place.

programme.title: First Blood (1982)
programme.desc: Green Beret veteran Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) takes on a Pacific Northwest sheriff (Brian Dennehy) and the National Guard.

programme.title: Mourning in Lod (2023)
programme.desc: The fates of three families become inextricably intertwined when a Palestinian citizen is killed by a Jewish settler in the city of Lod, Israel, and deadly riots break out.

programme.title: Black Noise (2023)
programme.desc: When an elite security team is sent to a remote island to rescue a VIP, their mission takes a turn as they are confronted by masked gunmen. To keep hold of their lives, the team must act quickly to assess the situation and escape the island.

programme.title: 6 Days (2017)
programme.desc: In April 1980, gunmen storm the Iranian Embassy in London. Highly trained SAS operatives prepare a counterattack, hoping to end the hostage situation in one swift blow.

programme.title: The Return (2024)
programme.desc: After 20 years away, Odysseus washes up on the shores of Ithaca. The king finds much has changed since he left to fight in the Trojan War. No longer the mighty warrior his people remember, Odysseus must face his past to save his family.

programme.title: Cujo (1983)
programme.desc: Bitten by a rabid bat, a huge dog traps a Maine woman (Dee Wallace) and her young son (Danny Pintauro) in their Ford Pinto.

programme.title: Braveheart (1995)
programme.desc: Enraged by the killing of his wife, Scotsman William Wallace leads a revolt against the tyrannical English king in the 13th century.

programme.title: Crisis (2021)
programme.desc: A drug trafficker organizes a smuggling operation while a recovering addict seeks the truth behind her sons disappearance.

programme.title: Scream 4 (2011)
programme.desc: The Ghostface Killer returns with a vengeance when self-help author Sidney Prescott (Neve Campbell) arrives in Woodsboro on the last stop of her book tour.

programme.title: The Faculty (1998)
programme.desc: A group of small town High School students, including an introverted photographer and a drug dealer, begin to suspect somethings off with their teachers. They realize that the faculty is under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites.

programme.title: Cujo (1983)
programme.desc: Bitten by a rabid bat, a huge dog traps a Maine woman (Dee Wallace) and her young son (Danny Pintauro) in their Ford Pinto.

programme.title: Love and Monsters (2020)
programme.desc: A young man and his traveling companions battle an array of monsters during an 80-mile journey to find the woman he loves.

programme.title: American Dream/American Knightmare (2018)
programme.desc: The life and exploits of Suge Knight, the co-founder of Death Row Records, and his influence on a highly influential era in music.

programme.title: 16 Shots (2019)
programme.desc: A Chicago police officer is charged with murder after the shooting of Laquan McDonald.

programme.title: Heist 88 (2023)
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind decides to pull one last job before going to prison and recruits a group of young bank employees to steal millions in a daring and brazen assault on the U.S. banking system.
